trans-unit.source: Represents a control that acts as a container for a group of controls within a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 表示一个控件，该控件作为 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView" /> 控件中的一组控件的容器。

trans-unit.source: In this topic:
trans-unit.target: 本主题内容：

trans-unit.source: [Introduction](#introduction)
trans-unit.target: [介绍](#introduction)

trans-unit.source: [Declarative Syntax](#declarative_syntax)
trans-unit.target: [声明性语法](#declarative_syntax)

trans-unit.source: Introduction
trans-unit.target: 介绍

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View> control is a container for a group of controls.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View>控件是一组控件的容器。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View> control must always be contained within a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView> control.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View>控件必须始终包含在<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView>控件。

trans-unit.source: Only one <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View> control at a time can be defined as the active view within a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView> control.
trans-unit.target: 只有一个<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View>一次的控件可以定义为中的活动视图<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView>控件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView.ActiveViewIndex%2A> property specifies the active <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View> control within the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView.Views%2A> collection of a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView> control.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView.ActiveViewIndex%2A>属性指定活动<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View>控件中<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView.Views%2A>集合<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView>控件。

trans-unit.source: The active view control is rendered to the client, as long as the containing <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView> control is visible.
trans-unit.target: 活动视图控件呈现给客户端，只要包含<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView>控件是否可见。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View.Visible%2A> property to determine whether a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View> control and its child controls are visible on the page and rendered to the client.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View.Visible%2A>属性来确定是否<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View>控件及其子控件是否在页上可见和呈现到客户端。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View> control can contain controls of any type, including other <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView> controls.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View>控件可以包含的任何类型，包括其他控件<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView>控件。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View> control does not support any style properties.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View>控件不支持任何样式属性。

trans-unit.source: To apply styles to a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View> control, add one or more <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Panel> controls to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View> control.
trans-unit.target: 若要应用到的样式<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View>控件中，添加一个或多个<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Panel>控件添加到<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View>控件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View> class provides the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View.Activate> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View.Deactivate> events.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View>类提供<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View.Activate>和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View.Deactivate>事件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View.Activate> event is raised when the current <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View> control becomes the active view.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View.Activate>引发事件时当前<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View>控件变为活动视图。

trans-unit.source: This occurs when the value of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView.ActiveViewIndex%2A> property changes or the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView.SetActiveView%2A> method is called to specify a different <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View> control.
trans-unit.target: 发生这种情况时的值<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView.ActiveViewIndex%2A>属性更改或<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView.SetActiveView%2A>调用方法来指定不同<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View>控件。

trans-unit.source: For example, if `View1` is the active view within a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView> control, when the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView.ActiveViewIndex%2A> property changes to specify `View2`, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View.Activate> event is raised for `View2` and the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View.Deactivate> event is raised for `View1`.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果`View1`是中的活动视图<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView>控件，当<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView.ActiveViewIndex%2A>属性更改，以指定`View2`、<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View.Activate>为引发事件`View2`和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View.Deactivate>均将引发事件`View1`.

trans-unit.source: To allow users to navigate between multiple <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View> controls within a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView> control, you can add a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinkButton> or <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button> control to each <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View> control.
trans-unit.target: 若要允许多个之间导航用户<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View>内控制<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView>控件，你可以添加<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinkButton>或<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button>控制对每个<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View>控件。

trans-unit.source: Set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinkButton> or <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button> control's `CommandName` property to the ID of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View> control to navigate to.
trans-unit.target: 设置<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinkButton>或<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button>控件的`CommandName`的 id 属性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View>控件导航到。

trans-unit.source: For a code example, see <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView.ActiveViewChanged>.
trans-unit.target: 有关代码示例，请参阅 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView.ActiveViewChanged>。

trans-unit.source: For more information on manipulating <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View> controls within a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView> control, see the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView> topic.
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息操作<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View>内控制<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView>控制，请参阅<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView>主题。

trans-unit.source: Declarative Syntax
trans-unit.target: 声明性语法

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to create a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView> control that contains three <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View> controls.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何创建<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView>包含三个控件<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View>控件。

trans-unit.source: The first time the page is loaded, `DefaultView` is set as the active view.
trans-unit.target: 首次加载页时，`DefaultView`被设置为活动的视图。

trans-unit.source: Each <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View> control contains link buttons to allow the user to navigate to different views.
trans-unit.target: 每个<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View>控件包含链接按钮使用户能够导航到不同视图。

trans-unit.source: Note that each <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View> control contains a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Panel> control to allow styles to be applied.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，每个<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View>控件包含<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Panel>控制选项可允许应用样式。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the current <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View" /> control becomes the active view.
trans-unit.target: 当前 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View" /> 控件成为活动视图时发生。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View.Activate> event is raised when the current <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View> control becomes the active view.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View.Activate>引发事件时当前<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View>控件变为活动视图。

trans-unit.source: This occurs when the value of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView.ActiveViewIndex%2A> property changes or the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView.SetActiveView%2A> method is called to specify a different <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View> control.
trans-unit.target: 发生这种情况时的值<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView.ActiveViewIndex%2A>属性更改或<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView.SetActiveView%2A>调用方法来指定不同<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View>控件。

trans-unit.source: For example, if `View1` is the active view within a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView> control, when the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView.ActiveViewIndex%2A> property changes to specify `View2`, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View.Activate> event is raised for `View2` and the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View.Deactivate> event is raised for `View1`.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果`View1`是中的活动视图<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView>控件，当<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView.ActiveViewIndex%2A>属性更改，以指定`View2`、<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View.Activate>为引发事件`View2`和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View.Deactivate>均将引发事件`View1`.

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to specify and code an event handler for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View.Activate> event of a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View> control.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何指定和代码的事件处理程序<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View.Activate>事件<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View>控件。

trans-unit.source: When the active view changes, a message is displayed to the user specifying the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View> control that raised the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View.Activate> event and the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View> control that raised the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View.Deactivate> event.
trans-unit.target: 当活动视图的更改时，为用户指定显示一条消息<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View>控制引发<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View.Activate>事件和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View>控制引发<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View.Deactivate>事件。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the current active <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View" /> control becomes inactive.
trans-unit.target: 当前的活动 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View" /> 控件变为非活动时发生。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View.Deactivate> event is raised when the current active <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View> control becomes inactive.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View.Deactivate>引发事件时的当前活动<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View>控件变为非活动状态。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View> control becomes inactive when the value of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView.ActiveViewIndex%2A> property changes or the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView.SetActiveView%2A> method is called to specify a different <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View> control.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View>时，控件变为非活动状态的值<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView.ActiveViewIndex%2A>属性更改或<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView.SetActiveView%2A>调用方法来指定不同<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View>控件。

trans-unit.source: For example, if `View1` is the active view within a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView> control, when the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView.ActiveViewIndex%2A> property changes to specify `View2`, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View.Deactivate> event is raised for `View1` and the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View.Activate> event is raised for `View2`.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果`View1`是中的活动视图<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView>控件，当<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView.ActiveViewIndex%2A>属性更改，以指定`View2`、<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View.Deactivate>为引发事件`View1`和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View.Activate>均将引发事件`View2`.

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to specify and code an event handler for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View.Deactivate> event of a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View> control.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何指定和代码的事件处理程序<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View.Deactivate>事件<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View>控件。

trans-unit.source: When the active view changes, a message is displayed to the user specifying the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View> control that raised the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View.Activate> event and the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View> control that raised the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View.Deactivate> event.
trans-unit.target: 当活动视图的更改时，为用户指定显示一条消息<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View>控制引发<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View.Activate>事件和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View>控制引发<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View.Deactivate>事件。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether themes apply to this control.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示主题是否应用于该控件。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to use themes; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果使用主题，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View.EnableTheming%2A> property indicates whether themes are enabled for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View> control.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View.EnableTheming%2A>属性指示是否为启用主题<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View>控件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View.EnableTheming%2A> property also affects whether themes are enabled for the controls contained in its <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Controls%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> collection.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View.EnableTheming%2A>是否为中包含的控件启用主题属性还会影响其<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Controls%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>集合。

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View.EnableTheming%2A> property is `true`, the application's theme directory is searched for control skins to apply.
trans-unit.target: 当<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View.EnableTheming%2A>属性是`true`，应用程序的主题目录中搜索要应用的控件外观。

trans-unit.source: If no skin for the particular control exists in the theme directory, a skin is not applied.
trans-unit.target: 如果用于特定的控件中的主题目录存在，则不会应用的外观。

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View.EnableTheming%2A> property is `false`, the theme directory is not searched and the contents of the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.SkinID%2A> property are not used.
trans-unit.target: 当<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View.EnableTheming%2A>属性是`false`，则不搜索主题目录和内容<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.SkinID%2A>不使用属性。

trans-unit.source: A control can override the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View.EnableTheming%2A> value set by its parent control, or by the containing page.
trans-unit.target: 控件可以重写<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View.EnableTheming%2A>值集，通过其父控件，或包含的页。

trans-unit.source: For example, if a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View> control has <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View.EnableTheming%2A> set to `false`, you can selectively apply themes to child controls contained within the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View> control by setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.EnableTheming%2A> property to `true` on the individual child controls.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View>控件具有<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View.EnableTheming%2A>设置为`false`，您可以有选择地应用于子控件中包含的主题<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View>通过设置<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.EnableTheming%2A>属性`true`对各个子控件。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.EventArgs" /> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: 包含事件数据的 <see cref="T:System.EventArgs" />。

trans-unit.source: Raises the <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View.Activate" /> event of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 引发 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View" /> 控件的 <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View.Activate" /> 事件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View.Activate> event is raised when the current <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View> control becomes the active view.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View.Activate>引发事件时当前<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View>控件变为活动视图。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.EventArgs" /> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: 包含事件数据的 <see cref="T:System.EventArgs" />。

trans-unit.source: Raises the <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View.Deactivate" /> event of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 引发 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View" /> 控件的 <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View.Deactivate" /> 事件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View.Deactivate> event is raised when the current active <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View> control becomes inactive.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View.Deactivate>引发事件时的当前活动<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View>控件变为非活动状态。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View" /> control is visible.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View" /> 控件是否可见。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View" /> control is visible; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View" /> 控件可见，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View.Visible%2A> property to determine whether the current <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View> control is visible and rendered to the client.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View.Visible%2A>属性来确定是否当前<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View>控件是否可见以及呈现给客户端。

trans-unit.source: For a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View> control to be visible on the rendered page, it must be the active view in its containing <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView> control, and the containing <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView> control must be visible.
trans-unit.target: 有关<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View>控制要在呈现的页面上显示，它必须是中其包含的活动视图<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView>控件，并包含<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView>控件必须可见。

trans-unit.source: If the containing <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView> control is not visible on the page, or if the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View> control is not the active view, then the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View> control and its child controls are not rendered.
trans-unit.target: 如果包含<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView>控件不可见的页上，或者如果<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View>控件不活动的视图，则<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View>控件及其子控件不会呈现。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View.Visible%2A> property is set internally based on the visibility and active view for the containing parent control.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View.Visible%2A>属性设置内部根据的可见性和包含的父控件的活动视图。

trans-unit.source: If you set this property at run time, an <xref:System.InvalidOperationException> exception is thrown.
trans-unit.target: 如果在运行时，设置此属性<xref:System.InvalidOperationException>引发异常。

trans-unit.source: If you set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View.Visible%2A> property at design time, any changes to the property are ignored.
trans-unit.target: 如果你设置<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View.Visible%2A>属性在设计时，对该属性的任何更改将被忽略。

trans-unit.source: An attempt was made to set this property at run time.
trans-unit.target: 尝试在运行时设置此属性。
